text: Uton biddan ealle eadmodlice þas haligan apostolas þæt hi for heora mæron geearnungon us geþingian to þan mildheortan hælðe þæt he us gemiltsie & sylle forgifennesse ealre ure synna þe we siððe oððe ær geworhtan oððe geþohtan ongean his leofan willan & þæt he geunnon us gesundfulnesse on þisre worulde & forgife us soþe sibbe on þise læne life & on þam toweardan ece reste on heofonan rice mid his eadigan apostolan þe we nu todæg wurþiað & mid eallon his halgan.
Se þe leofað & rixað a buton ænde on ecnesse, amen.
